comments: Nice Melodrama. Ending Is Nice. In Episode 7, There Were 2 Scenes That Made Me Shed Tears. 1st One When Marketing Lead Fight With The President For Her Ex-Husband And Another One Is When The Writer Died.
synopsis: Cha Eun Ho is a successful and handsome writer who is also the youngest chief editor at a publishing company. He has a calm demeanor and remains reasonable. . . (Source: MyDramaList)
